content.en: Today is Valentine's Day! A day for love. Some people love chocolate, they want to eat it all the time! Some people love their pets… but they don't want to eat them!
content.tw: 愛有很多種，有人愛巧克力，有人愛寵物。

content.en: Some people love helping others. A great way to do that is to donate. That means giving your stuff away for free.
content.tw: 還有人愛幫助別人。這些人會去捐東西。

content.en: Charity shops are where you can donate your stuff. They sell it, and use the money to help good causes.
content.tw: 你可以把東西捐給慈善商店。他們會把東西賣掉，用賺來的錢幫助其他人。

content.en: In the UK, someone donated an old bag full of stuff to a charity shop. They found a mystery Valentine's Day card!
content.tw: 在英國，有一個人捐了滿滿一袋東西給慈善商店，結果他們找到一個神秘的情人節卡片！

content.en: In the card was a beautiful poem, and a photo of a woman and her three children. The end of the poem says: "From the person that loves you more than anything else in the world". Awwww!
content.tw: 卡片上面有一首詩，還有一個媽媽跟三個小孩的一張照片。詩的結尾寫說：「愛你勝過一切的人敬上」。

content.en: The card was written for the woman in the photo, but no-one knows who she is!
content.tw: 這張卡是給照片裡面的媽媽的，但沒有人認識他。

content.en: The photo is black and white, so they know the card must be very old. It will be hard to find the woman, or her family. But it will make her so happy to see the card again!
content.tw: 因為照片是黑白的，所以一定是很久以前的，要找到人應該很難，但如果她真的收到了，一定會很開心！

content.en: The things we do for love…
content.tw: 這就是我們為愛所做的事⋯⋯

vocabulary.preface: 一張表達深刻愛情的卡片，讓人想追尋它的故事。

content.text:
1. woman 女子
There's an old woman standing there with a bag in her hand.
Hmmm, do you think she needs help? 你覺得她需要幫忙嗎？

2. donate 捐獻
I don't know. 不知道。
Maybe we can donate some food to her. 也許我們可以捐一點食物給她。
Donating food? 捐食物嗎？
What if she's not hungry? 要是她不餓怎麼辦？

3. give 給予
Then we can give her something else. 那我們就給她別的東西。
Well, you'd better ask her what she needs. 你最好問問她需要什麼。

4. sell 賣
She's just hoping to sell the bag! 她只是想把包包賣掉。
She made many different ones. 她做了很多個不同的包。
Wow, silly us! 哇，我們真傻。

vocabulary.postscript:
你有捐獻過什麼東西嗎？
woman 女子
donate 捐獻
give 給予
sell 賣

quiz.question: What word means to give your stuff away for free to help people?
Where can you go to give away your old stuff?
What color was the photo in the card?

content.en: Hi, students! Have you ever heard of the phrase, "busy as a bee?" If someone is "busy as a bee", it means he or she is really busy.
content.tw: 你們有聽過「跟蜜蜂一樣忙」這種講法嗎？意思是這個人非常忙。

content.en: Bees are busy insects. They go to many flowers and collect pollen. That's good for flowers. Bees also build hives. The hives are their homes. And, of course, bees make honey. That's good for us.
content.tw: 蜜蜂是很忙碌的昆蟲。他們要蒐集花粉，要蓋蜂窩，也就是他們的家。蜜蜂還會做蜂蜜！

content.en: Here's something you probably didn't know about bees. They like to play! Some people at a university in London proved that. They taught bees to roll small balls. How did the researchers teach the bees to roll little balls? They gave them food when they rolled the balls.
content.tw: 但你可能不知道，蜜蜂也喜歡玩耍！倫敦一所大學的研究人員教蜜蜂滾小球，只要蜜蜂滾動小球，就給牠們食物。

content.en: But the researchers found something else really interesting. They saw the bees playing with balls even when they didn't get food.
content.tw: 但是研究人員發現，就算沒有食物，蜜蜂還是會去玩球。

content.en: Researchers also found that younger bees played with the balls more than adult bees. Hey, that's just like humans! Kids like to play more than their parents, right?
content.tw: 他們還發現年輕的蜜蜂更愛玩球。跟人類很像，小孩也比大人愛玩！

content.en: One young bee played with a ball 117 times. Wow... 117 times! I guess that bee was having a ball. "Having a ball" means to have a good time. I hope you kids are having a ball, too, today!
content.tw: 一隻小蜜蜂玩球玩了117次。哇…117次！我想那隻蜜蜂玩得很開心。「玩得很開心」的意思就是過得很愉快。我希望你們今天也玩得很開心！

vocabulary.preface: 蜜蜂不是應該整天辛勤工作嗎？但是有機會時牠們也會玩。

content.text:
1. hear 聽到
I've never heard such a thing! 我從來沒有聽過這種事！
What? 什麼事？
Bees playing with balls? 蜜蜂會玩球嗎？
Yeah, bees are insects. 對啊，蜜蜂是昆蟲。
They make honey. 牠們製造蜂蜜。
They don't play.

2. mean 意思
You mean insects don't know how to have fun? 你的意思是昆蟲不懂怎麼玩？
Right. They must think the ball is food. 對。牠們一定以為球是吃的東西。

3. food 食物
No, their food is pollen. 不對，牠們的食物是花粉。
Well, to a young bee, balls probably look like pollen.

4. prove 證明
You can't prove that. 你沒辦法證明。
You're right. I can't.
I wish I were a bee.

vocabulary.postscript:
來讀讀今天的單字。
hear 聽到
mean 意思
food 食物
prove 證明

quiz.question: 1. What did the bees play with?
2. What is true about young bees?
options: A: The like to play more than adults.
B: They don't like to play much.
C: They like to play as much as adults do.

quiz.question: 3. What does the phrase, "having a ball" mean?

title: Girl Allowed to Own a Unicorn

content.en: Hey students! Do you have a pet? Maybe you have a dog. Or maybe you have a cat. Or maybe a bird. Or maybe you have a unicorn? What? Unicorns aren't real? Shhh! I know that, and you know that. But don't tell an American girl named Madeline.
content.tw: 你們有養寵物嗎？狗狗、貓咪、小鳥，還是獨角獸呢？我們都知道獨角獸不是真的，但可別跟 Madeline 講喔！

content.en: Madeline lives in California. She really wants a unicorn. But she wants to make sure she can own a unicorn if she finds one. So, she wanted to first get a license.
content.tw: Madeline 住在加州，她很想要養一隻獨角獸。為了確定她找到獨角獸之後可以養牠，Madeline 想要先申請一個證照。

content.en: She asked the Los Angeles animal control people to give her a license, and they did! They sent her a license. The license is in the shape of a heart. They also sent her a small stuffed toy unicorn. Ahh, so cute!
content.tw: 她跟洛杉磯動物管理局申請，他們也真的給了她證照！證照是愛心形狀的，他們還給了她一個獨角獸娃娃！

content.en: Madeline was really happy to get the license. But, the animal control people said there are some things she must do. Madeline has to take it out of her house sometimes so it can see the sun and the moon and rainbows. Also, she must polish its horn once a month with a soft cloth. Oh, and she has to feed it watermelon once a week.
content.tw: 動物管理局人員說 Madeline 必須好好照顧獨角獸，要帶牠出門看看太陽、月亮，跟彩虹。還要每個月一次保養牠的角，並且每星期要餵牠吃西瓜！

content.en: I hope you find your unicorn, Madeline. Good luck!
content.tw: Madeline，我希望妳能找到妳的獨角獸。祝妳好運！

vocabulary.preface: 洛杉磯動物管理局，滿足了一個小女孩對獨角獸的想望。

content.text:
1. toy 玩具
I used to have many stuffed animal toys. 我以前有很多絨毛動物玩具。
Me too. My favorite one was a giraffe.

2. find 找到
Did you find it at a store? 你在商店裡找到的？
No, my dad gave it to me.
That's one reason I loved it so much.

3. cute 可愛的
It's soft and cute and has a long neck.
Do you still have it?
No.

4. send 送出
But I made sure that it has a good home.
How? 你怎麼做的？
I sent it back to my dad.
You sent it back? 送回去了？
Yeah, my dad loved it, too!

vocabulary.postscript:
今天的單字好玩又簡單。
toy 玩具
find 找到
cute 可愛的
send 送出

quiz.question: 2. What shape is the license Madeline got?
3. What must Madeline do if she finds a unicorn?
options: B: Keep it locked in her house
C: Take it for a walk on Sundays

title: Samba Steps Boost Brazilian Soccer Skills

content.en: There's a big party in Brazil this week! Called the Rio Carnival. It happens every year, in a city called Rio de Janeiro.
content.tw: 里約嘉年華來了！它每年會在里約熱內盧這個城市舉辦。

content.en: The biggest dance in Brazil is the samba. So, at the Rio Carnival, everyone is samba dancing!
content.tw: 巴西最熱門的舞蹈是森巴舞，嘉年華的時候大家都在跳森巴！

content.en: Samba is all about the lower body. The legs move really fast, while the upper body stays still. Soccer, or "football", is the same. It's mostly played with the feet. Lots of Brazilian players say samba dancing helps them play better soccer!
content.tw: 跳森巴舞的時候，下半身跟腿動得很快，但是上半身不動，跟踢足球有一點像！很多巴西的足球員都說，跳森巴舞讓他們的球技更好！

content.en: Brazil's soccer team has won the FIFA World Cup five times, that's more than anyone else. When one of their team scores, Brazilians celebrate with some smooth samba steps!
content.tw: 巴西足球隊曾經獲得五次的世界盃冠軍，比其他所有國家還多。只要巴西球隊進球，球迷們就會跳森巴來慶祝！

content.en: What do you think? Could dancing make you better at sports? It's great for keeping you fit and healthy… Could "Baby Shark" make you a basketball superstar!? "Baby Shark, do doo do do dodo…" Okay, maybe not…
content.tw: 你覺得呢？跳舞能讓你更擅長運動嗎？它對保持健康很有益…《Baby Shark》能讓你成為籃球巨星嗎？！「Baby Shark, do doo do do dodo…」好吧，也許不能…

content.en: Why not watch some of the Rio Carnival this week, and learn some smooth samba steps? Who knows, maybe you could be a big soccer star someday!
content.tw: 這週何不看看里約嘉年華，學一些流暢的森巴舞步呢？誰知道，也許有一天你也能成為一名足球巨星！

vocabulary.preface: 巴西的森巴舞，對足球員大有幫助。

content.text: 1. dance 跳舞 I love dancing. 我喜歡跳舞。 Do you do the samba, Nancy? 你跳森巴舞嗎？ I can if you play the music. 你放音樂的話我會跳。 You're a wonderful samba dancer!
2. healthy 健康的 Dancing keeps me fit and healthy. 跳舞讓我保持身材和健康。 And you can join me.
3. body 身體 Well, I'm better at line dancing. 我比較會跳排舞。 It's slower. 它比較慢。 I also get to move my whole body.
4. learn 學習 I have an idea. 我有個主意。 Let's learn belly dancing! 我們來學肚皮舞！ We can't. We don't have big bellies.

vocabulary.postscript: 來跳舞吧，不過要先讀單字。dance 跳舞 healthy 健康的 body 身體 learn 學習
